title: "Mapping and AI apps suggest ceasing management of forests not enough to offset carbon emissions"
excerpt: "A team of atmospheric and climatic scientists from several institutions in Europe has found that even if all human management of forestry land stopped immediately, it would not be sufficient to offset global carbon emissions."
